actionConfiguration.body: SELECT * FROM users where name ilike '%{{usersTable.searchText}}%' ORDER BY id LIMIT 10 offset {{(usersTable.pageNo - 1) * 10}}

UPDATE users SET name = '{{userNameInput.text}}', address = '{{userAddressDropdown.text}}', email = '{{userEmailInput.text}}', role = '{{userRoleDropdown.selectedOptionValue}}' WHERE id = {{usersTable.selectedRow.id}}
